statements: SELECT id, property_address, owner_name, owner_email, transfer_date, blockchain_hash FROM real_estate_ownership;
SELECT owner_name, property_address, owner_email, transfer_date, id, blockchain_hash FROM real_estate_ownership;
SELECT property_address, transfer_date, owner_email, blockchain_hash, owner_name, id FROM real_estate_ownership;
SELECT id, owner_name, property_address FROM real_estate_ownership;
SELECT id, owner_email, property_address, blockchain_hash FROM real_estate_ownership;
SELECT * FROM real_estate_ownership WHERE id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, owner_email, property_address FROM real_estate_ownership WHERE transfer_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, property_address, owner_name, transfer_date FROM real_estate_ownership WHERE owner_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT owner_email FROM real_estate_ownership WHERE property_address = '123 Main Street' AND transfer_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM real_estate_ownership WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM Property;
SELECT address, owner_id FROM Property;
SELECT id, address, owner_id FROM Property ORDER BY owner_id DESC;
SELECT property_id, owner_id, transfer_date FROM Ownership WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT id, address, blockchain_hash FROM Property WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Property WHERE owner_id = 1 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, address FROM Property WHERE id > 5
SELECT address, owner_id FROM Property WHERE address LIKE '%Main%'
SELECT * FROM Ownership JOIN Property ON Ownership.property_id = Property.id WHERE owner_id = 2 AND transfer_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT property_id, owner_id, transfer_date FROM Ownership WHERE owner_id = 3 ORDER BY transfer_date ASC
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, owner_address FROM RealEstateOwners
SELECT * FROM RealEstateProperties ORDER BY property_value DESC
SELECT property_id, property_address FROM RealEstateProperties WHERE property_value > 100000
SELECT * FROM RealEstateOwners JOIN PropertyTransfers ON RealEstateOwners.owner_id = PropertyTransfers.new_owner_id
SELECT property_address, property_value FROM RealEstateProperties WHERE property_value < 50000
SELECT * FROM RealEstateOwners
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM RealEstateOwners ORDER BY owner_name ASC
SELECT property_id, property_address, property_value FROM RealEstateProperties WHERE property_value > 100000
SELECT owner_name, property_address FROM RealEstateOwners JOIN RealEstateProperties ON RealEstateOwners.owner_id = RealEstateProperties.property_id

SELECT transfer_id, RealEstateOwners.owner_name AS previous_owner, RealEstateOwners_1.owner_name AS new_owner, PropertyTransfers.transaction_hash FROM PropertyTransfers JOIN RealEstateOwners ON PropertyTransfers.previous_owner_id = RealEstateOwners.owner_id JOIN RealEstateOwners AS RealEstateOwners_1 ON PropertyTransfers.new_owner_id = RealEstateOwners_1.owner_id
SELECT * FROM property_owners;
SELECT owner_name, email_address FROM property_owners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'House';
SELECT property_id, property_address FROM properties WHERE property_address LIKE '%Ave';
SELECT owner_name, email_address, phone_number FROM property_owners WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM property_owners;
SELECT owner_name, email_address FROM property_owners WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT property_address, property_type FROM properties ORDER BY property_address DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT block_id, transaction_id, block_hash FROM blockchain_records WHERE previous_block_hash IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM real_estate_owners;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, property_address FROM real_estate_owners WHERE owner_name='John Doe';
SELECT listing_price, listing_date, property_address FROM property_listings ORDER BY listing_price DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT property_address, event_description, event_date FROM property_history WHERE event_description LIKE '%renovation%';
SELECT owner_name, property_address FROM real_estate_owners WHERE owner_id = '6a97c5d7-46e3-4e45-bc34-72d29820d0a7';
SELECT * FROM property_listings WHERE listing_price > 100000 ORDER BY listing_date DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, transaction_date FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '123 Main St' OR receiver_address = '456 Elm St';
SELECT property_address, previous_owner_id, new_owner_id FROM property_transfers WHERE transfer_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transfer_date ASC;
SELECT property_address, MAX(event_date) AS latest_event_date FROM property_history GROUP BY property_address ORDER BY latest_event_date DESC;
